languages.text: "Потому что ты и есть засранец с пушкой. Если бы я вытащила тебя из передряг столько раз, сколько это сделала Джай, я бы тебя и не так называла". {n}Сестра контрабандиста закатывает глаза.{/n} "Не слушайте его, Ваша Светлость. Кор получил ровно ту кличку, на которую наработал".

"Because you are the arsehole with the gun. If I'd dragged you out of as many scrapes as Jae has, that's not the name I'd be using for you, I can tell you that much." {n}Kor's sister rolls her eyes.{/n} "Pay no attention to him, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Kor has nobody to blame but himself for that nickname."
languages.original_text: "Потому что ты и есть засранец с пушкой. Если бы я вытащила тебя из передряг столько раз, сколько это сделала Джай, я бы тебя и не так называла". {n}Сестра контрабандиста закатывает глаза.{/n} "Не слушайте его, Ваша Светлость. Кор получил ровно ту кличку, на которую наработал".

Kor has nobody to blame but himself for that nickname."

If I'd dragged you out of as many scrapes as Jae has, that's not the name I'd be using for you, I can tell you that much." {n}Kor's sister rolls her eyes.{/n} "Pay no attention to him, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Kor has nobody to blame but himself for that nickname."

languages.text: “因为你就是个拿枪的王八蛋。如果我也像婕伊一样，拼着老命救了你那么多次的话，那我给你起的绰号恐怕会更难听。”{n}科尔的妹妹翻了个白眼。{/n}“别听他胡说八道，大人。科尔被人起了这么个绰号，这完全是他自己活该。”
languages.original_text: "Because you are the arsehole with the gun. If I'd dragged you out of as many scrapes as Jae has, that's not the name I'd be using for you, I can tell you that much." {n}Kor's sister rolls her eyes.{/n} "Pay no attention to him, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Kor has nobody to blame but himself for that nickname."

traits.locale_text: “因为你就是个拿枪的王八蛋。如果我也像婕伊一样，拼着老命救了你那么多次的话，那我给你起的绰号恐怕会更难听。”{n}科尔的妹妹翻了个白眼。{/n}“别听他胡说八道，大人。科尔被人起了这么个绰号，这完全是他自己活该。”
traits.speaker: Torra

languages.text: 「あんたは銃を持ったゴロツキだ。もし俺があんたをジェイのように何度も窮地から救い出したとしたら、あなたにそんな名前は使わない。それだけは言える」{n}コーの姉は目を丸くする。{/n}「彼のことは気にしないでください、陛下。コーがそんなあだ名で呼ばれているのは、自分のせいですから」
languages.original_text: "Because you are the arsehole with the gun. If I'd dragged you out of as many scrapes as Jae has, that's not the name I'd be using for you, I can tell you that much." {n}Kor's sister rolls her eyes.{/n} "Pay no attention to him, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Kor has nobody to blame but himself for that nickname."

traits.locale_text: 「あんたは銃を持ったゴロツキだ。もし俺があんたをジェイのように何度も窮地から救い出したとしたら、あなたにそんな名前は使わない。それだけは言える」{n}コーの姉は目を丸くする。{/n}「彼のことは気にしないでください、陛下。コーがそんなあだ名で呼ばれているのは、自分のせいですから」
traits.speaker: Torra

languages.text: «Porque eres un capullo con pistola. Si yo te hubiera sacado de tantos fregados como Jae, te aseguro que te llamaría algo muy diferente». {n}La hermana de Kor pone los ojos en blanco.{/n} «No le haga caso, mi{mf|lord|lady}. La culpa del apodo de Kor es suya y solo suya».
languages.original_text: "Because you are the arsehole with the gun. If I'd dragged you out of as many scrapes as Jae has, that's not the name I'd be using for you, I can tell you that much." {n}Kor's sister rolls her eyes.{/n} "Pay no attention to him, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Kor has nobody to blame but himself for that nickname."

traits.locale_text: «Porque eres un capullo con pistola. Si yo te hubiera sacado de tantos fregados como Jae, te aseguro que te llamaría algo muy diferente». {n}La hermana de Kor pone los ojos en blanco.{/n} «No le haga caso, mi{mf|lord|lady}. La culpa del apodo de Kor es suya y solo suya».
traits.speaker: Torra

languages.text: « Parce que c'est ce que tu es : un connard avec un flingue. Si je passais mon temps à te sauver les miches comme Jae, c'est pas le surnom que je te choisirais, tu peux me croire, {n}rétorque la sœur de Kor en levant les yeux au ciel.{/n} Ne faites pas attention à lui, Votre Seigneurie. Kor ne peut s'en prendre qu'à lui-même pour ce charmant sobriquet. »
languages.original_text: "Because you are the arsehole with the gun. If I'd dragged you out of as many scrapes as Jae has, that's not the name I'd be using for you, I can tell you that much." {n}Kor's sister rolls her eyes.{/n} "Pay no attention to him, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Kor has nobody to blame but himself for that nickname."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que c'est ce que tu es : un connard avec un flingue. Si je passais mon temps à te sauver les miches comme Jae, c'est pas le surnom que je te choisirais, tu peux me croire, {n}rétorque la sœur de Kor en levant les yeux au ciel.{/n} Ne faites pas attention à lui, Votre Seigneurie. Kor ne peut s'en prendre qu'à lui-même pour ce charmant sobriquet. »
traits.speaker: Torra

languages.text: "Ihr seid nun mal das Arschloch mit der Knarre. Wenn ich Euch aus so oft den Arsch gerettet hätte wie Jae, käme mir ein anderer Name in den Sinn, so viel kann ich sagen." {n}Kors Schwester verdreht die Augen.{/n} "Gebt nicht so viel darauf, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Kor hat sich seinen Spitznamen absolut selbst zuzuschreiben."
languages.original_text: "Because you are the arsehole with the gun. If I'd dragged you out of as many scrapes as Jae has, that's not the name I'd be using for you, I can tell you that much." {n}Kor's sister rolls her eyes.{/n} "Pay no attention to him, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Kor has nobody to blame but himself for that nickname."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid nun mal das Arschloch mit der Knarre. Wenn ich Euch aus so oft den Arsch gerettet hätte wie Jae, käme mir ein anderer Name in den Sinn, so viel kann ich sagen." {n}Kors Schwester verdreht die Augen.{/n} "Gebt nicht so viel darauf, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Kor hat sich seinen Spitznamen absolut selbst zuzuschreiben."
traits.speaker: Torra

languages.text: "Şu silahlı göteleksin de ondan. Seni Jae kadar çok badireden kurtarmış olsaydım tercih edeceğim tanımlama bu olmazdı, benden söylemesi." {n}Kor'un kardeşi gözlerini deviriyor.{/n} "Ona kafanızı takmayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kor'un bu lakabı almasının tek sorumlusu kendisi."
languages.original_text: "Because you are the arsehole with the gun. If I'd dragged you out of as many scrapes as Jae has, that's not the name I'd be using for you, I can tell you that much." {n}Kor's sister rolls her eyes.{/n} "Pay no attention to him, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Kor has nobody to blame but himself for that nickname."

traits.locale_text: "Sen şu silahlı göteleksin de ondan. Seni Jae kadar çok badireden kurtarmış olsaydım, tercih edeceğim tanımlama bu olmazdı, o kadar söylemiş olayım." {n}Kor'un kardeşi gözlerini deviriyor.{/n} "Ona kafanızı takmayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kor'un bu lakabı almasındaki tek mesul kendisi."
traits.speaker: Torra
